title: 117th Annual Golden Dragon Parade Grandstand Tickets
desc: The 117th Golden Dragon Parade will?begin at 1:00 pm. ? (LINK TO MAP HERE) ? Parade Route: Hill Street at Temple toward Bernard. Right on Bernard, right on Broadway back to Broadway & Temple. ? Street closure Information (may change without notice): **Tickets are not refundable.** Tickets will be available for pick up under the Will Call Booth next to the Grandstand, located on Broadway. Will call booth will be open at 12:00 p.m.
